data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControlDropDown
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the popup window of all the editors owned by the LayoutControl.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControlDisabled
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the contents of the editors owned by the LayoutControl when they are disabled. This option is only in effect for DevExpress controls that support the Style Controller mechanism.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControl
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the contents of all the editors owned by the LayoutControl.

data.name: EmptySpaceItemTextVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the text region is visible.

data.name: EmptySpaceItemMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum size of the EmptySpaceItem.

data.name: EmptySpaceItemMaxSize
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum size of the EmptySpaceItem.

data.name: DataLayoutControlDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the data source providing data for editors that are created by the DataLayoutControl control.

data.name: DataLayoutControlDataMember
data.value: Gets or sets the data source member which supplies data to the DataLayoutControl's editors.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout item is visible within the LayoutControl in regular mode (when layout customization is not performed) and in customization mode.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemTextVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the text region is visible.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemTextToControlDistance
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between the control displayed within the layout item and the text region.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemTextSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the text region.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemTextLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the text region.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemTextChanged
data.value: Fires after the layout item's text has been changed.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemText
data.value: Gets or sets the text associated with the layout item.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemSpacing
data.value: Gets or sets the outer indents of the item's borders.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemSize
data.value: Gets or sets the layout item's size.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemShown
data.value: Fires after an item has been made visible.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemShowing
data.value: Fires when the item is about to be added to the layout (by dragging it from the Customization Form).

data.name: BaseLayoutItemPadding
data.value: Gets or sets the amount of space in pixels between the item's borders and its contents.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemMouseUp
data.value: Occurs when the mouse button is released if it was pressed within a layout item.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemMouseDown
data.value: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over a layout item and a mouse button is pressed.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the item's minimum size.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemMaxSize
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum size of the layout item.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the layout item's top left corner.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemHiding
data.value: Fires when the item is about to be hidden (when dragging the item and dropping it onto on the Customization Form).

data.name: BaseLayoutItemHidden
data.value: Fires after an item has been hidden.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemDoubleClick
data.value: Fires when the current item is clicked.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemCustomizationFormText
data.value: Gets or sets the layout item's caption within the Customization Form.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemClick
data.value: Fires when the current item is clicked.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemAppearanceItemCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint a layout item's caption.

data.name: BaseLayoutItemAllowHide
data.value: Gets or sets whether the item can be hidden to the Customization Form.

data.name: LayoutControlAllowCustomizationMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether the customization menu can be invoked by end-users.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionDisabledLayoutItem
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint captions of disabled layout items or items that display disabled controls.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionDisabledLayoutGroupCaption
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint captions of disabled layout groups.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControlReadOnly
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the contents of the editors owned by the LayoutControl when they are in the read-only state. This option is only in effect for DevExpress controls that support the Style Controller mechanism.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControlFocused
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the currently focused editor within the LayoutControl.

data.name: LayoutAppearanceCollectionControlDropDownHeader
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the header panel within the popup windows of all the editors owned by the LayoutControl.

data.name: LayoutControlAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the controls located within the layout control.

data.name: LayoutControlAutoScroll
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout control will allow an end-user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.

data.name: LayoutControlBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the control's background color.

data.name: LayoutControlCaptionImages
data.value: Gets or sets a collection of images that can be displayed within layout group captions.

data.name: LayoutControlChanged
data.value: Fires when a property of the layout control is changed.

data.name: LayoutControlChanging
data.value: Fires when a property of the layout control is about to be changed.

data.name: LayoutControlCustomizationMenuManager
data.value: An object which provides the Context Menu.

data.name: LayoutControlGroupItems
data.value: Provides access to the visible layout items owned by the current group.

data.name: LayoutControlGroupOwner
data.value: Gets or set the LayoutControl that owns the current layout group.

data.name: LayoutControlIsModified
data.value: Gets whether the layout has been changed.

data.name: LayoutControlItemAllowHotTrack
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout item's borders are highlighted when the mouse cursor hovers over it.

data.name: LayoutControlItemContentVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout item's contents are visible.

data.name: LayoutControlItemControl
data.value: Gets or sets the control which is owned by the layout item.

data.name: LayoutControlItemControlAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment of the LayoutControlItem's control within the layout item.

data.name: LayoutControlItemControlMaxSize
data.value: Gets or sets the client area's maximum size.

data.name: LayoutControlItemControlMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the control's minimum size.

data.name: LayoutControlItemEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout item and its control are enabled.

data.name: LayoutControlItemImage
data.value: Gets or sets the image displayed in the item's label.

data.name: LayoutControlItemImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment of the image within the label.

data.name: LayoutControlItemImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image assigned to the item.

data.name: LayoutControlItemImageToTextDistance
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between the item's label and image.

data.name: LayoutControlItemMaxSize
data.value: Gets or sets the layout item's maximum size.

data.name: LayoutControlItemMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the item's minimum size.

data.name: LayoutControlItemOptionsPrint
data.value: Provides access to options that specify how the LayoutControlItem is printed/exported.

data.name: LayoutControlItemOwner
data.value: Gets or set the LayoutControl that owns the current layout item.

data.name: LayoutControlItemSizeConstraintsType
data.value: Gets or sets the size constraints type.

data.name: LayoutControlItemTextAlignMode
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment settings of the item's control.

data.name: LayoutControlItemTrimClientAreaToControl
data.value: Gets or sets whether the client region's height is trimmed to match the control's height.

data.name: LayoutControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings that control the layout control's look and feel.

data.name: LayoutControlMenuManager
data.value: Gets or sets an object that controls the look and feel of the popup menus.

data.name: LayoutControlOptionsCustomizationForm
data.value: Provides access to the options which control the appearance and behavior of the Customization Form.

data.name: LayoutControlOptionsFocus
data.value: Provides access to the layout control's focus options.

data.name: LayoutControlOptionsItemText
data.value: Provides access to the default alignment settings of the controls displayed in the LayoutControl.

data.name: LayoutControlOptionsPrint
data.value: Provides access to the options that specify how a LayoutControl is printed/exported.

data.name: LayoutControlOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the display options of the LayoutControl.

data.name: LayoutControlRoot
data.value: Gets or sets the LayoutControl's root group.

data.name: LayoutControlStyleController
data.value: Gets or sets the style controller component that provides appearance settings for the control.

data.name: LayoutControlTabPageCloseButtonClick
data.value: Fires when a Close button within a tab page is clicked.

data.name: LayoutControlToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and content of hints displayed for layout items.

data.name: LayoutGroupAllowBorderColorBlending
data.value: Gets or sets whether to colorize the layout group border and caption according to the BorderColor setting in skinning paint schemes.

data.name: LayoutGroupAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether the LayoutGroup's icon should be painted in the same color as the LayoutGroup's foreground color.

data.name: LayoutGroupBackgroundImage
data.value: Gets or sets the group's background image that can be stretched across the group, tiled, centered, etc.

data.name: LayoutGroupBackgroundImageLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the position and behavior of the background image assigned to the LayoutGroup.BackgroundImage property.

data.name: LayoutGroupBackgroundImageVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the background image, specified by the LayoutGroup.BackgroundImage property, is in effect.

data.name: LayoutGroupCaptionImage
data.value: Specifies the image to display within the group's caption area.

data.name: LayoutGroupCaptionImageIndex
data.value: Gets the index of an image in an image collection which must be displayed within the group's caption.

data.name: LayoutGroupCaptionImageLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the relative position of an image within the group caption.

data.name: LayoutGroupCaptionImagePadding
data.value: Gets or sets padding for the image displayed in the current group's page header.

data.name: LayoutGroupCaptionImageVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the group caption image is visible.

data.name: LayoutGroupContentImage
data.value: Gets or sets the group's background image that is displayed \"as is\", and can be aligned to any group's edge.

data.name: LayoutGroupContentImageAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the content image's alignment within the group.

data.name: LayoutGroupDefaultLayoutType
data.value: Gets or sets the default layout type for newly created items within the current group.

data.name: LayoutGroupEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether layout items that belong to the current group are enabled.

data.name: LayoutGroupEnableIndentsWithoutBorders
data.value: Gets or sets whether a layout group's indents, specified by its BaseLayoutItem.Spacing and BaseLayoutItem.Padding properties, are applied when the group's borders are hidden.

data.name: LayoutGroupExpandButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets the direction of the expand button's arrow.

data.name: LayoutGroupExpandButtonVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the group's expand button is visible.

data.name: LayoutGroupExpanded
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current group is expanded.

data.name: LayoutGroupGroupBordersVisible
data.value: Gets whether the group's borders are visible.

data.name: LayoutGroupItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the items that belong to the current group.

data.name: LayoutGroupLayoutMode
data.value: Gets or sets layout the mode for a LayoutGroup.

data.name: LayoutGroupOptionsItemText
data.value: Gets the options that determine how the controls displayed within the current group are aligned.

data.name: LayoutGroupPageEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tab that corresponds to the current group is enabled. This property is in effect when the group is represented as a tab page within a TabbedControlGroup.

data.name: LayoutGroupShowTabPageCloseButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether a Close button is displayed within a group when it's embedded into a TabbedGroup.

data.name: LayoutGroupSize
data.value: Gets or sets the group's size.

data.name: LayoutItemContainerAllowCustomizeChildren
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout of the current container can be customized using drag and drop.

data.name: LayoutItemContainerAppearanceGroup
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the group's appearance.

data.name: LayoutItemContainerAppearanceTabPage
data.value: Provides access to a tabbed group's appearance settings.

data.name: LayoutItemContainerTextLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the container's side along which its caption is displayed.

data.name: LayoutSerializationOptionsRestoreAppearanceItemCaption
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings of item captions are loaded when a layout is loaded from a data store.

data.name: LayoutSerializationOptionsRestoreAppearanceTabPage
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings of tab pages are loaded when a layout is loaded from a data store.

data.name: LayoutSerializationOptionsRestoreLayoutGroupAppearanceGroup
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings of groups are loaded when a layout is loaded from a data store.

data.name: LayoutSerializationOptionsRestoreLayoutItemCustomizationFormText
data.value: Gets or sets whether values of layout items' BaseLayoutItem.CustomizationFormText properties are restored when restoring the control's layout from a data store.

data.name: LayoutSerializationOptionsRestoreLayoutItemText
data.value: Gets or sets whether layout items' captions are restored when restoring the control's layout from a data store.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormAllowHandleDeleteKey
data.value: Gets or sets whether the default handling of the DELETE key in customization mode is disabled.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormDefaultRestoreDirectory
data.value: Gets or sets the default directory for the Open dialog that is opened when clicking on the Customization Form's Load Layout button.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormDefaultSaveDirectory
data.value: Gets or sets the default directory for the Save dialog that is opened when clicking on the Customization Form's Save Layout button.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormDesignTimeCustomizationFormPositionAndSize
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates and bounding rectangle of the control's Customization Form at design time.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormEnableUndoManager
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Undo Manager, which allows customization operations to be reverted, is enabled.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormQuickModeInitDelay
data.value: Gets or sets a delay between pressing the LayoutControl and the start of quick customization mode initialization.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormQuickModeLoadIndicatorSize
data.value: Gets or sets the size of the quick customization mode load indicator.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormQuickModeLoadTime
data.value: Gets or sets quick mode activation time.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowLayoutTreeView
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Layout Tree View tab page is visible in the Customization Form.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowLoadButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form's Load button is visible.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowPropertyGrid
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Property Grid is displayed within the Customization Form.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowRedoButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form's Redo button is visible.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowSaveButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form's Save button is visible.

data.name: OptionsCustomizationFormShowUndoButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form's Undo button is visible.

data.name: OptionsFocusActivateSelectedControlOnGotFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether the currently selected child control is activated when the LayoutControl receives focus.

data.name: OptionsFocusAllowFocusControlOnActivatedTabPage
data.value: Gets or sets whether the first control within a tab page is focused when the tab page is activated.

data.name: OptionsFocusAllowFocusControlOnLabelClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether a layout item's control is focused when its label is clicked.

data.name: OptionsFocusAllowFocusGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether the expand buttons of regular groups can be focused when the TAB key is pressed.

data.name: OptionsFocusAllowFocusReadonlyEditors
data.value: Gets or sets whether read-only editors are focused when focus is moved between controls using the TAB key.

data.name: OptionsFocusAllowFocusTabbedGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether the headers of tabbed groups can be focused.

data.name: OptionsFocusEnableAutoTabOrder
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Automatic Tab Order feature is enabled.

data.name: OptionsFocusMoveFocusDirection
data.value: Gets or sets the direction in which focus moves in Automatic Tab Order mode when the TAB key is pressed.

data.name: OptionsFocusMoveFocusRightToLeft
data.value: Gets or sets whether focus moves from right to left.

data.name: OptionsItemTextAlignControlsWithHiddenText
data.value: Gets or sets whether controls with hidden text must be aligned when the control alignment is enabled.

data.name: OptionsItemTextGroupAlignControlsWithHiddenText
data.value: Gets or sets whether controls with hidden text must be aligned when the local alignment of controls within the group is enabled.

data.name: OptionsItemTextGroupTextAlignMode
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment settings of the controls displayed in the current group.

data.name: OptionsItemTextGroupTextToControlDistance
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between the text regions of layout items and the corresponding controls.

data.name: OptionsItemTextTextAlignMode
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment settings of the controls which are displayed in the LayoutControl.

data.name: OptionsItemTextTextToControlDistance
data.value: Gets or sets the default distance between the text regions of layout items and the corresponding controls.

data.name: OptionsTableLayoutGroupColumnCount
data.value: Returns the number of columns within the table layout.

data.name: OptionsTableLayoutGroupRowCount
data.value: Returns the number of rows within the table layout.

data.name: OptionsViewAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether icons for all layout items within the current LayoutControl should be painted in the items' foreground colors.

data.name: OptionsViewAllowHotTrack
data.value: Gets or sets whether layout item borders are highlighted when the mouse cursor hovers over the layout items.

data.name: OptionsViewAllowItemSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether the OptionsView.DrawItemBorders, OptionsView.HighlightDisabledItem and OptionsView.HighlightFocusedItem options are in effect.

data.name: OptionsViewAlwaysScrollActiveControlIntoView
data.value: Gets or sets whether focusing a control that is out of view automatically scrolls the LayoutControl to make this control visible.

data.name: OptionsViewAutoSizeInLayoutControl
data.value: Gets or sets how a LayoutControl's size is changed when it is positioned within another LayoutControl.

data.name: OptionsViewAutoSizeModeInLayoutControl
data.value: Gets or sets how a LayoutControl's size is changed when it's positioned within another LayoutControl.

data.name: OptionsViewDragFadeAnimationFrameCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of frames in the fade animation.

data.name: OptionsViewDragFadeAnimationSpeed
data.value: Gets or sets the fade animation length.

data.name: OptionsViewDrawAdornerLayer
data.value: Gets or sets whether to draw an adorner layer that is used to provide customization visual cues.

data.name: OptionsViewDrawItemBorders
data.value: Gets or sets whether layout item borders are visible at runtime.

data.name: OptionsViewEnableTransparentBackColor
data.value: Allows the parent's background to be seen through the LayoutControl.

data.name: OptionsViewHighlightDisabledItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether disabled layout items are highlighted according to the current skin.

data.name: OptionsViewHighlightFocusedItem
data.value: Gets or sets whether focused layout items are highlighted according to the current skin.

data.name: OptionsViewIsReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether the layout control is read-only.

data.name: OptionsViewItemBorderColor
data.value: Gets or sets the color used to paint layout item borders when they are visible.

data.name: OptionsViewPaddingSpacingMode
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: OptionsViewShareLookAndFeelWithChildren
data.value: Determines whether the LayoutControl manages the look and feel and style settings of DevExpress .NET controls that are displayed within the LayoutControl.

data.name: OptionsViewUseDefaultDragAndDropRendering
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the default paint mechanism to indicate drag-and-drop operations.

data.name: OptionsViewUseSkinIndents
data.value: Gets or sets whether padding settings (BaseLayoutItem.Padding and BaseLayoutItem.Spacing) of items and groups are obtained from the current skin. This is a backward compatibility option.

data.name: SplitterItemMaxSize
data.value: Gets or set the maximum size of the splitter item. This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: SplitterItemMinSize
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum size of the splitter item. This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: TabbedControlGroupTabPages
data.value: Gets the collection of layout groups which is owned by the current tabbed group.

data.name: TabbedGroupCaptionImagePadding
data.value: Gets or sets default padding for images displayed in the page headers belonging to the current group.

data.name: TabbedGroupOwner
data.value: Gets or set the LayoutControl that owns the current tabbed group.

data.name: TabbedGroupSelectedPageChanged
data.value: Occurs when a tab page is activated.

data.name: TabbedGroupSelectedPageChanging
data.value: Enables you to prevent changing the selected page.

data.name: TabbedGroupSelectedTabPage
data.value: Gets or sets the currently selected layout group within the tabbed group.
